quotes.quote: I don't think necessity is the mother of invention - invention, in my opinion, arises directly from idleness, possibly also from laziness. To save oneself trouble.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: An inventor is simply a fellow who doesn't take his education too seriously.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: We are more ready to try the untried when what we do is inconsequential.  Hence the fact that many inventions had their birth as toys.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Getting caught is the mother of invention.
quotes.author: Robert Byrne

quotes.quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Invention is the mother of necessity.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen
